name: Lemon-Soy Broccoli
keywords: broccoli, lemon juice, soy sauce, fall, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 tablespoons butter or olive or peanut oil, or to taste
3 tablespoons lemon juice and soy sauce, mixed in equal parts, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the flowerets from the broccoli and cut the stems into thin slices crosswise (or reserve the stems for another use).

Stir-fry the broccoli pieces in butter or oil in a wok or deep skillet over high heat, adding judicious splashes of the lemon-soy mixture, to taste, as you proceed. Cook only until the flowerets are just tender. Adjust the seasonings and serve.
